Description: I am selling my Music Man Silouette Special in pearl white sparkle finish. The guitar is in excellent condition with no dings, dents, or scratches. There is a minor finish crack by the neck pocket, however it does not go into the wood (please see pictures). The sale includes the the G&G hardshell case, hang tag, and tools.
